meanings.definition: A group of related families in biological classification.
meanings.sent1: In the forest, the different superfamilies of animals live together in harmony.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper explained how the superfamilies of primates are classified based on their genetic similarities.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the superfamilies of cousins and aunts gathered for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The superfamilies of flowers in the garden bloomed in a beautiful array of colors.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the superfamilies of insects to understand their evolutionary relationships.

meanings.definition: A large and diverse group of related things or people.
meanings.sent1: The conference brought together superfamilies of experts in various fields to share their knowledge.
meanings.sent2: In the bustling city, the superfamilies of neighborhoods each had their own unique character.
meanings.sent3: The superhero team was made up of superfamilies of individuals with extraordinary abilities.
meanings.sent4: The library contained superfamilies of books, ranging from classic literature to modern fiction.
meanings.sent5: The festival attracted superfamilies of visitors from all over the world to celebrate diversity.
